name: ActInvoiceAdjudicationPaymentSummaryCode
title: ActInvoiceAdjudicationPaymentSummaryCode
description: Codes representing a grouping of invoice elements (totals, sub-totals), reported through a Payment Advice or a Statement of Financial Activity (SOFA). The code can represent summaries by day, location, payee, etc.
